name: Connect The Cord
description:
You will play as a young boy with a defective tablet, and he would want to plug it into an outlet to enjoy his time with it, or it would be a very bad time. However, there is a lack of electrical outlet in the school, so you will have to traverse through the long, narrow hallways, avoiding haphazard objects such as puddles of water, paper airplanes, class clowns throwing bananas at you, and a bunch of bullies.

However, you are also able to zap and whip the enemies with your electrical cord by pressing Z and X, though zapping will make you lose battery power, so use them wisely.

Note: There is a bug where the camera might stop moving.  If that happens when playing you have to reset the game from the pause menu.
